Name: CarePlanActivityKind
Title: Care Plan Activity Kind
Descriptino: Resource types defined as part of FHIR that can be represented as in-line definitions of a care plan activity.

Name: CarePlanActivityOutcome
Title: Care Plan Activity Outcome
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the outcome of a care plan activity. Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanActivityStatus
Title: CarePlanActivityStatus
Descriptino: Codes that reflect the current state of a care plan activity within its overall life cycle.

Name: CarePlanCategory
Title: Care Plan Category
Descriptino: Example codes indicating the category a care plan falls within.  Note that these are in no way complete and might not even be appropriate for some uses.

Name: CarePlanIntent
Title: Care Plan Intent
Descriptino: Codes indicating the degree of authority/intentionality associated with a care plan.

Name: CareTeamCategory
Title: Care Team category
Descriptino: Indicates the type of care team.

Name: CareTeamStatus
Title: CareTeamStatus
Descriptino: Indicates the status of the care team.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: CommunicationCategory
Title: CommunicationCategory
Descriptino: Codes for general categories of communications such as alerts, instructions, etc.

Name: CommunicationNotDoneReason
Title: CommunicationNotDoneReason
Descriptino: Codes for the reason why a communication did not happen.

Name: EventStatus
Title: EventStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of an event.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: SNOMEDCTMedicationCodes
Title: SNOMED CT Medication Codes
Descriptino: This value set includes all drug or medicament substance codes and all pharmaceutical/biologic products from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar value set.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: ProcedureCodes(SNOMEDCT)
Title: Procedure Codes (SNOMED CT)
Descriptino: Procedure Code: All SNOMED CT procedure codes.

Name: RequestPriority
Title: Request priority
Descriptino: The clinical priority of a diagnostic order.

Name: RequestStatus
Title: RequestStatus
Descriptino: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.

Name: ParticipationMode
Title: ParticipationMode
Descriptino: Identifies the primary means by which an Entity participates in an Act.
